summary: This document is an email forwarding an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) executive summary regarding the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York. It includes a link to a Justice Department press release file.

events.title: OPR Epstein Summary Forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an OPR executive summary regarding the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: An OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) executive summary regarding the Epstein case was forwarded via email on November 13, 2020.
The document originates from or pertains to the Southern District of New York's handling of the Epstein matter.
A link to a Justice Department press release file (https://www.justice.gov/opa/press-release/file/1336416/download) is included in the correspondence.
